title: Google | L5 | Bengaluru | Accepted
content:
Education: Tier 3 College
Years of Experience: 6.5 YOE
Prior Experience: Microsoft L62, Amazon L4
Date of the Offer: Oct 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: L5
Location: Bengaluru
Base Salary: 65L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 4.5L + 6L
Stock bonus:$280k USD over 4 years with 33/33/17/17 vesting. 77L for the first year
Bonus: 15% of Salary
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock + Signon + Relocation): ~1.62cr
Benefits: Standard google benefits for India

Huge thanks to the Leetcode Community for the platform and support. Couldn't have done it without you all! 😊

title: LinkedIn | SDE | Bengaluru, India
content:
## LinkedIn SDE Full-Time (Pre-placement Offer)

- **Education**: Bachelor of Engineering (Computer Science)
- **Years of Experience**: 3 months (Internship)
- **Prior Experience**: Software Engineering Intern at LinkedIn
- **Date of Offer**: September 2024
- **Date of Joining**: July 2025
- **Company**: LinkedIn
- **Title/Level**: Software Engineer (Entry Level)
- **Location**: Bengaluru, India

### Compensation Breakdown:

- **Base Salary**: ₹17,00,000 per annum
- **Joining Bonus**: ₹1,00,000 (one-time)
- **Performance Bonus/Incentive**: ₹1,70,000 per annum
- **Restricted Stock Units (RSUs)**: $50K USD over four years ***(Microsoft stocks)***
  - First-year value: ₹9,62,500 (vests 25% in the first year, remaining 75% vests quarterly over the next 3 years)
- **Provident Fund + Gratuity**: ₹1,00,000
- **Total Compensation (Base + Stocks):** ~60 Lakhs

- **First Year - Total Compensation (Base + Bonus + Stock)**: ₹30,50,808 per annum (approx. ₹30.5 LPA)

### Additional Benefits:

- **Insurance**:
  - Life Insurance: Coverage up to ₹500,000
  - Medical and Accident Insurance: Coverage 3 times the base salary
- **Meals**: Complimentary company-paid breakfast, lunch, and snacks
- **Transport**: Shuttle service for daily commute
- **Educational Reimbursement**: ₹1.2L upon successful completion of an approved certification/degree

title: Nutanix | MTS-2 | Banglore
content:
Education: Tier 3
Years of Experience: 3
Prior Experience: Startup

Company: Nutanix
Title/Level: MTS-2
Location: BLR
Salary: 26,00,000
Relocation: 2,60,000
Signing Bonus: NIL
Others : 7K Cab, 2K Food, Medical, 3.3K for mobile etc
Stock bonus: $28K stock grant vested over 3.5 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 35 Lac 
Other details: Tried negotiating but couldn't bump it up

title: Zepto | SDE 1 | Bengaluru
content:
Education: BE in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 13 months
Prior Experience: SDE 1 at a fintech startup
Previous Compensation: 12 lakh fixed + 3 lakh ESOP + pf gratuity etc

Date of the Offer: September 2024
Company: Zepto
Title: Software Developer 1
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 25 lakh (Base) + pf gratuity etc
Stock bonus: 20 lakh stock grant vested over 4 years
Total comp (Salary + Stock): 45.6 lakh

Other details: Initial offer was of 21 lakh fix + 2 lakh Joining Bonus + 20 lakh stocks but then negotiated and removed joining bonus part for a higher base.

title: JPMC | SWE 2 | Bengaluru |
content:
Education: B.Tech 3rd Tier
Years of Experience: 4
Current Company: Mid Level Service Based Company
Current Compensation: 12.75L (fixed)

Date of the Offers: Oct '24
Company: JP Morgan
Title/Level: Software Engineer II
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 21L Fixed
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: 10-15 % of Base as per Performance
Total comp: 21L
Benefits: Standard other benefits.

Asked for some higher compensation, but didn't get.
Is it okay as per Company Standard or am I getting low balled?
